abstract: Rengan Rajaratnam pleaded not guilty on Monday to insider trading charges, coming nearly two years after the conviction of his older brother, the fallen hedge fund titan Raj Rajaratnam.
snippet: Rengan Rajaratnam pleaded not guilty on Monday to insider trading charges, coming nearly two years after the conviction of his older brother, the fallen hedge fund titan Raj Rajaratnam.

headline.main: Brother of a Fallen Hedge Fund King Pleads Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Brother of a Fallen Hedge Fund King Pleads Not Guilty
